title: Distance - Under The One Sky (320kbps)
description:
Well produced AOR with hi-tech and funk overtones and a brash drum sound, Distance were a natural successor to the Powerstation who featured legendary producer Bernard Edwards and Tony Thompson and replacing Robert Palmer was Robert Hart.
